texts.en: Amon is a diligent, committed and hard-working person. He lives in a remote area, where the residents travel to town just twice a year to purchase food products.  In the wintertime, there is no way to access the village. Amon and his fellow villagers mostly grow potatoes. After the collapse of the Soviet Union, Amon went to Russia. Amon has suffered many difficulties in life. Since Amon was not educated as a child and has no profession, he also encountered many difficulties in Russia. When he was in Russia, his wife was left with small children and was growing potatoes. Amon has worked hard to educate his son and found a private school for him to attend. His son Shamsullo attended a private school and has received several commendations from the school administration. Hoping to better his son's future, Amon took his son to Russia after he finished high school. Shamsullo enrolled at Krasnoyarsk State Medical University named after Professor Voyno- Yasenetsskogo in the medical faculty. The father is very happy for his son's success and has requested a loan from IMON to cover his son's tuition. He looks forward to your generosity and compassion.

loans.use: To pay for the education of his son

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 42 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, vive en el municipio de Villanueva, Cortes junto a sus dos hijos. Siempre se ha dedicado al negocio. Lleva 10 años de tener su negocio de venta de comidas y golosinas, vende almuerzos, desayunos, baleadas, tacos, pastelitos, refrescos, churros, galletas etc. Ella ha invertido ya dos prestamos anteriores, el actual que solicita es por 15,000 Lempiras y los va invertir en la compra de insumos para la elaboración de comidas como ser carnes, condimentos, harina, arroz, verduras, y también refrescos para vender, con el propósito de aumentar sus ventas. El plan que tiene es seguir con el negocio para la manutención y la educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
María, 42, is single due to widowhood.  She lives in the municipality of Villanueva, Cortes, with her two children. She’s always been a businesswoman.  She’s had a food and snack stall for ten years.  She sells lunches, breakfasts, ‘baleadas’ [flour tortilla filled with eggs, cheese and beans], tacos, turnovers, soft-drinks, packaged snacks, cookies, etc.

She’s invested two previous loans and is currently asking for 15,000 Lempiras to buy ingredients like meat, condiments, flour, rice and vegetables to make the food and also to buy soft-drinks to sell aiming at increasing sales.  Her plan is to stay in business to support and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food and soft-drinks to sell.

loans.name: Sayfura

texts.ru: Сайфуре 46 лет и проживает в городе Исфара. Она замужем, у нее 3 взрослых сына. Двое из них вместе с отцом работают за границей, другой сын с женой живет вместе с ней. Сайфура по профессии бухгалтер, но последние 8 лет она занимается торговлей. Сайфура на рынке имеет свою лавку по продажам сладостей. Она продает там шоколад, конфеты, леденцы, мармелад, разные печенье, пряники и многое другое. Сайфура искренний человек, она чиста душой и храбра сердцем, своей положительной энергией она заряжает не только своих покупателей, но и просто прохожих. Сайфура любит свою работу, любит продавать сладости и хочет продолжить свою деятельность надолго, и ей нужно все время обновлять товар новым ассортиментом. Для этого она просит кредит. Ей необходимо приобрести новый товар, в частности разнообразный ассортимент конфет, шоколад и печенье для развития бизнеса. Она надеется на Вашу отзывчивость!
texts.en: Sayfura is 46 years old and lives in Isfara. She is married and has three adult sons. Two of them work abroad along with their father, and another son and his wife live with her. Sayfura is an accountant, but over the last 8 years, she has been engaged in trade. Sayfura has her own sweet shop at the market. There, she sells chocolates, candies, lollipops, jellies, various cookies, cakes, and more. Sayfura is a sincere person, with a pure soul and a brave heart, and her positive energy recharges not only her customers, but also passerby. Sayfura loves her job, loves to sell sweets and wants to continue her work for a long time.  She always needs to update her merchandise. She has requested a loan in order to do this. She needs to buy new products, including a variety of sweets, chocolate and cookies to grow her business for business. She looks forward to your responses!

loans.use: To purchase a variety of candies, chocolates and cookies to expand her business

loans.name: Chevy

texts.es: Chevy tiene 36 años, es una mujer emprendedora y amante del trabajo, es casada y tiene 02 hijos de 05 y 02 años respectivamente, con quienes vive en su casa propia.El negocio de Chevy consiste en la venta de productos comestibles, todos los días desde muy temprano abre las puertas de su tienda para atender a sus clientes que llegan hasta su establecimiento en busca de algún producto con la seguridad que ahí encontrarán lo que necesitan. Su bodega es la única de su zona por lo que siempre tienen buenas ventas, además de eso el trato tan cordial y la amabilidad que expresa en cada una de sus palabras son la cualidades perfectas para que sus clientes estén siempre agradecidos. Lleva en este negocio recién 6 meses y asegura que fue la mejor elección laboral que pudo tomar. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y verlos empezar el día con una sonrisa, considera que lo más difícil fue acostumbrarse a levantarse temprano para atender su tienda, sin embargo, sabe que es su trabajo y que tiene que hacerlo. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su financiamiento para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados. Se compromete a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado de S/.1000 soles, comprará cierta cantidad de productos tales como huevos, leche, ciertas verduras y frutas.
texts.en:
Chevy, 36, is an enterprising woman that loves to work.  She’s married with two children who are 5 and 2 years of age respectively living with her in a house of her own.  Chevy’s business consists in selling food items.  She opens her store’s doors every day very early to tend to customers that arrive at her establishment looking for products sure that they’ll find what they need there.  Her store is the only one in the zone so sales are always good.  Also, the cordial, kind treatment she expresses with every word she utters are perfect qualities that her customers always appreciate.

She’s only been in business six months but she assures that it’s been the best work decision she’s made.  What she likes best about her work is chatting with customers seeing them start their day with a smile.  She considers the most difficult part getting used to rising early to tend to the store.  However, she knows that it’s her work and she has to do it.

This is her first MFP loan and she’s grateful to all those who make it possible so she can continue working with better results.  She commits to make her payments punctually and will use the requested 1,000 soles to buy a certain amount of goods like eggs, milk, certain vegetables and fruit.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Sharifaoy

texts.ru: Шарифаой родилась в 1992 года. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Ее муж студент и еще не имеет источника дохода. Шарифаой тоже является студенткой. Она с детства занималась шитьем женской одежды и этим зарабатывала на жизнь, так как ее родители глухо-немые люди. Шарифаой несмотря на все трудности жизни с отличными оценками закончила среднюю школу и поступила в Худжандский Государственный Университет. Она учится по специальности экономиста. Шарифаой должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет финансовой поддержки со стороны родителей и мужа. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sharifaoy was born in 1992. She is married but has no children. Her husband is still a student and has no source of income. Sharifaoy is also a student. Since childhood, she has been sewing women's clothing to earn a living, because her parents are deaf mutes. Despite all the difficulties in her life, Sharifaoy graduated from high school with excellent grades and enrolled in Khujand State University. She is studying for a degree in economics. Sharifaoy needs to pay should pay her tuition, but has no financial support from parents or husband. She has requested a loan to pay her tuition. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for education

loans.name: Murodjon

texts.ru: Муродджон очень трудолюбивый и целеустремлённый, порядочный молодой человек. Условия жизни у них  тяжелые. С самых ранних лет он  занимался животноводством и выращиванием зерновых культур. После занятий в школе он пас скот жителей своего кишлака, чтобы заработать деньги для  содержания семьи. Несмотря на все трудности Муродджон окончил школу с отличием.  После окончания средней школы он поступил в Таджикский Государственный Университет на юридический факультет. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Murodjon is a very hard-working and dedicated, decent young man. His living conditions are difficult. From his earliest years, he was engaged in animal husbandry and cultivation of crops. After school, he herded cattle for other village residents to earn money to support his family. Despite all the difficulties, Murodjon graduated from high school with honors. After high school, he enrolled at the Tajik State University's law faculty. He has requested a loan to pay his tuition. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for education

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлюда трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Ей 40 лет. Она вдова и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Она одна воспитывает одного сына и четырех дочерей. Мавлюда 5 лет назад начала свой бизнес скотоводством. Вначале ей было очень трудно справляться с бизнесом, так как дети еще были маленькими и не могли помочь ей по введению бизнеса. Мавлюда постепенно изучила все тонкости своего дело и сегодня успешно введет свой бизнес. Она единственная кормилица своих детей. Она планирует развивать свой бизнес и увеличить доход. Она запрашивает займ для покупки скота, чтобы расширить оборотный капитал. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mavluda is a hardworking and kind woman. She is 40 years old. She is a widow and is raising five children. She is single-handedly raising one son and four daughters. Mavluda started her livestock business 5 years ago. At the beginning, it was very difficult to cope with the business, since the children were still young and could not help her get the business off the ground. Gradually, Mavluda learned all the intricacies of this business and now successfully runs the business. She is the only breadwinner for her children. She plans to grow her business and increase its revenue. She has requested a loan to buy cattle to expand her working capital. She awaits your kindness .

loans.use: To buy cattle for increasing working capital

loans.name: Nasser

texts.en: Nasser is a 55-year-old married man from Lebanon living with his wife and three children, who are attending school. He has owned a store since 2008, where he sells tasty nuts, chocolates and groceries. With the loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, he will purchase chocolate packs and crystal plates. Nasser states that he will be using these packs and plates to insert chocolates inside them, creating original designs to be sold on occasions.  He is very optimistic and confident that the loan will allow him to gain more customers and make a higher income.

loans.use: to purchase chocolate packs and crystal plates

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is a 56-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and two children. Because of her enormous care toward children, she decided to work as a babysitter in 2008. She works from her home where she receives kids to take care of. 

Today, May is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l., to purchase toys and entertainment tools to amuse the kids and keep them relaxed and happy. 

In the future, she aims to open a day nursery and equip it with needed supplies and tools in order to welcome children properly.

loans.use: to purchase toys and entertainment tools for her child care business.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
La Señora Mery es comerciante, vende todo tipo de productos en oficinas, como ser artefactos para el hogar, ya sean electricos, a gas, etc.; vive  en alquiler, en la zona de San Pedro de la ciudad de la Paz.Mery es soltera y no tiene hijos.
El crédito lo necesita para incrementar de su capital, adquiriendo mercadería de temporada como licuadoras, ollas, cubiertos, etc., y  de esta manera poder aumentar sus ingresos.

El sueño de Mery es poder culminar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en: Mery’s a merchant selling all types of products, like gas or electric home appliances, in offices.  She’s a renter in the city of La Paz’s San Pedro zone.  She’s single and has no children.  She needs the loan to increase capital.  She will buy seasonal merchandise like blenders, pots, cutlery, etc. to increase her income this way.  Her dream is to be able to complete her university studies.

loans.use: to buy blenders, pots, cutlery, etc.

loans.name: Jose Osman

texts.es: José, tiene 33 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene 1 hijo y residen en el municipio de San Rafael, Lempira. El siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura ayudando a su padre. Y hace 6 años cultiva su propia finca de café. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local. Ha solicitado un segundo préstamo que es por 15,000 lempiras, para comprar fertilizantes, abonos y pagar mano de obra para darle mantenimiento a su finca de café. Su meta es que su familia tenga mejores condiciones de vida y que su finca este siempre en buen estado.
texts.en:
José, 33, and his spouse are in a common law relationship and have one son; they live in the municipality of San Rafael, Lempira.  He’s always worked in agriculture helping his father and has had his own coffee plantation for six years.   He sells his crop in the local market. 

He’s asked for a second loan for 15,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizer and manure and to pay labor costs to provide coffee crop maintenance.   His goal is that his family has better living conditions and that his farm is always in good condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Imtaiaz

texts.en:
Imtaiaz is a 47-year-old, hard-working woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, with her husband, five sons and five daughters. All of her children are studying in school. Her husband owns a tea hotel (restaurant) in the main market, which is the only source of income for their family. His monthly net income is insufficient to meet the family's needs. Presently, he needs additional capital to purchase one more tea hotel. 

For that his wife, Imtaiaz, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband. As their family expenditures are higher than their monthly income and savings, she wants to buy him one more tea hotel with the loan amount. As a result, they can increase their monthly income as well as savings. Her dreams are to provide higher education for her children, and she is very thankful to Kiva for such great help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy a second tea stand

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Doña Mercedes es una mujer dinámica a sus 71 años; ella es emprendedora y siempre abierta a las oportunidades de negocio desde muy joven, por eso desde hace 18 años, cuando sintió la necesidad de obtener ingresos para apoyar el sustento de su hogar, se dedicó a vender mercancías variadas, especialmente productos de tocador, y posteriormente ingresó en la venta por multinivel, mediante guías especializadas de productos. Hoy desde su casa, vende la mercancía que exhibe en su vitrina, a crédito y de contado, entre sus vecinos, amigos y referidos por estos. Sus compras las hace de contado, en el centro de la ciudad, donde encuentra proveedores que le ofrecen precios competitivos, para que pueda genera ganancias siendo justa. Su meta es ampliar su negocio,  mejorar su exhibición con una nueva vitrina y más adelante con nuevos ingresos, hacer adecuaciones a su vivienda, para habitar cada vez mas, en espacios confortables. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará artículos de tocador, como champo, jabón toallas, accesorios etc. Con su credikiva aumentará la variedad de sus productos y esto es bueno para impactar a su mas apreciada clientela e impulsar la demanda de las mercancías que ella vende..
texts.en:
Mercedes is a dynamic, 71-year-old, enterprising woman who has always been open to business opportunities since a very young age.  This is why 18 years ago when she felt the need to earn extra income to support her home she decided to start selling various merchandise, especially personal care items.  Later on, she started to sell via catalog.  Today, she sells at home using a display case.  She sells on credit and for cash among neighbors, friends and referrals.  She pays cash for her purchases downtown where she finds the suppliers with the most competitive prices so she can earn a fair profit.

Her goal is to expand the business, to improve display with a new case and later on with new income to make home improvements so her living spaces will be more comfortable every day.  

She’s applying for a Kiva loan, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy personal care items like shampoo, soap, towels, accessories, etc.  Her Kiva loan will increase the variety of her products which will impact her clientele more and push demand for the merchandise she sells.

loans.use: to buy personal hygiene products like shampoo, soap, towels, etc.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: El señor Juan Carlos, es una persona trabajadora y responsable indican sus vecinos y amigos, es soltero e independiente, vive en alquiler en el mismo lugar de su actividad economica, se dedica a la venta de DVDs por mayor, el señor Juan Carlos comercializa a los demás comerciantes de DVDs de la población de Ivirgarzama sin problema alguno, se gana la vida de esa manera vendiendo de lunes a domingo durante todo el año, el señor Juan Carlos  desea ampliar su negocio (traer más mercadería), y poder estudiar en la universidad técnica, ubicado en la población de Ivirgarzazama,  para lo cual necesita mejorar sus ingresos, esta es la razón por la cual el señor solicita un préstamo para que pueda comprar un poco más de mercadería, y así el pueda tener un poco mas de ingreso económico, para que pueda estudiar en la universidad técnica y así en el futuro sea un profesional.
texts.en: Juan Carlos is a hard-working and responsible person according to his neighbors and friends.  He is single and independent and lives in a rented space from which he also conducts his business.  He sells DVDs wholesale to other DVD vendors in the town of Ivirgarzama without any problems.  He earns his living in this way, selling from Monday to Sunday all year long.  Juan Carlos wants to expand his business (bring in more merchandise), and be able to study at the technical university which is located in the town of Ivirgarzama.  To do this he needs to earn more money and that is why he is asking for a loan so that he can buy more merchandise to have a little more income and be able to study at the technical university, becoming a professional in the future.

loans.use: to expand his merchandise by buying more DVDs.

loans.name: Irine

texts.en:
Irine lives in the Eldoret area of Kenya and has two children. Her primary income sources are milk and transportation services. She has been doing this work for four years.  

She stated what is most enjoyable about farming: “milking and selling milk in the market.” She stated her biggest challenge as, “Milk production lowers during dry periods, lowering down profits.” Animals on the farm have been given the names of “Lelmet” (has white forehead).

Irine was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied, “quick services and a lower interest rate compared to other financial institutions.” This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session, to which she replied, “how to plan and  to use budgets.”

Her highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked, “How will this loan benefit (your) family?”, Irine replied, “increased income flow and hence, improve our living standards.”

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Irine owns a cow and a motorcycle, but does not own a pig, poultry, pump, bicycle, or automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household a mosquito net, but does not have electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV, or DVD.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan, a 53-year-old woman from Lebanon, lives with her husband and four children, some of  whom still attend school. Her husband has worked in the construction field for the past 25 years, while Sawsan has been selling detergents and creams for the past seven years. The couple works cooperatively to earn an adequate income that allows them and the children to live in good conditions. 

With her loan request from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, Sawsan seeks to purchase more detergents and creams to sell in order to increase her sales and income. In the future, she hopes to become the owner of a proper shop where she can better display her products.

loans.use: purchase more detergents and creams

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie, who  lives in Compound #3, is a 35-year-old mother of two children aged 11 and 13, both of whom are in school.  Her husband is a local businessman, while she been operating a table selling fashion clothes for five years.

Now requesting a loan to purchase more clothes for her enterprise, Mamie's plan is to educate her  children.

loans.use: to purchase more fashion clothes for her business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive en casa propia con sus padres, él posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, alimentos enlatados, agua embotellada, verduras y otros productos más. Él es una persona muy responsable y amable la cual cuenta con varios clientes por la variedad de productos. El cliente  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos, ya que el mayor deseo de él  es el de poder surtir su negocio y así percibir mayores ganancias y tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con sus padres.
texts.en:
The borrower lives in his own home with his parents.  He has a store where he sells staples such as bread, milk, eggs, canned goods, bottled water, vegetables, and other products.  He is a very responsible and kind person who has a variety of customers due to the range of his products. 

The borrower is asking for a loan with which he can have the necessary money to buy a greater quantity of products. This is because his greatest desire is to be able to stock his business and thus receive greater earnings and have a better quality of live, together with his parents.

loans.use: to buy bread, milk, eggs, canned foods, bottled water, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa lives in the Eldoret area of Kenya, which is a primary milk producing area. She has six children and has been doing this work for 23 years. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, and personal business.

She stated that "Milking" is the most enjoyable thing about farming.  Her biggest challenge is "Transporting products during the rainy season." Animals on the farm have been given the names of  "Mogondo"'

Theresa was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied, "It invests in farmers".' This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session, "Its important to properly keep records."

Her highest monthly expense is business related. When asked  "How will this loan benefit her family", Theresa replied,  "Increase food supply."'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Theresa owns the following: 'cow' but does not own 'pig, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net, solar power' but does not have 'electricity, running water, sewing machine, TV, DVD'.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase poultry.

loans.name: Bushra Group

texts.en: Bushra is a 52-year-old married woman. She has been running a vegetable shop with her husband for 15 years. Bushra is part of a 4-person group and is shown in the photo. She started the vegetable shop with her husband at home 15 years ago. They have applied for a loan from Kiva Partner BRAC to purchase their own house. They are currently living in a rental home. Bushra is thankful to BRAC for its support.

loans.use: To buy a house.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego vive en la zona de Escobar Uria de la ciudad de La Paz. Trabaja realizando mantenimiento de computadoras y arreglando celulares. Diego necesita el crédito para aumentar su capitalpara comprar más repuestos tanto de computaodras como de celulares e instalar un taller donde tenga mejores condiones de trabajo. Con el préstamo anterior pudo mejorar sus condiciones económicas pero aun no ha llegado a su máximo potencial.

El sueño de Diego es poder  culminar sus estudios universitarios ya que el esta estudiando informatica en una universidad estatal de la ciudad de La Paz.
texts.en:
Diego lives in the Escobar Uria neighborhood of La Paz.  His job is computer maintenance and cell phone repair.  Diego needs the loan to increase his capital so he can purchase more spare parts for computers as well as for cell phones.  He also wants to set up a workshop where he could have better working conditions.  With the previous loan, Diego was able to improve his financial situation, but he still hasn't reached his maximum potential. 

Diego's dream is to complete his university program; he is studying Computer Sciences at the State University in La Paz.

loans.use: to purchase more spare parts for computers and cell phones.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda, 58 years old, is from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with five children who are mostly adults. Her eldest is 30 and the youngest is 17 years old. Rosalinda has been engaged in a sari-sari (variety) store business for 13 years now. She also finances fertilizer to farmers in her community. She is asking for a loan to buy additional stock of seasoning, toiletries, canned goods, feed and fertilizer.

She is optimistic that the loan will bring forth more profit for her business. It will pay for her household basic needs and food.

In the future, she hopes to expand her business and make it more profitable for future savings.

loans.use: to  buy seasoning, toiletries, canned goods, feed and fertilizer

loans.name: Rahmatjon

texts.ru: Рахматджон опытный ювелир, проживающий в городе Душанбе. Ему 30 лет, он семейный человек. В течение многих лет Рахматджон работал на заводе мастером по ремонту и изготовлению золотых и серебряных изделий. На сегодняшний день он приобрел достаточный опыт и теперь хочет открыть свою точку по предоставлению ювелирных услуг. Рахматчон планирует работать сам и помогать людям восстановить их серебренные и золотые украшения, и создавать их по заказу. Одновременно он уже договорился с продавцами ювелирных магазинов на рынке и в будущем будет сдавать им на продажу созданные им золотые изделия. У Рахматджона имеется собственный капитал в виде рабочего стола, ювелирных инструментов и сбережения. Чтобы открыть свою точку ему необходимо приобрести ювелирный аппарат по изготовлению изделий. К сожалению для покупки этого аппарата у него не хватает денежных средств, так как он стоит очень дорого. По этой причине он вынужден взять кредит, чтобы начать дело. Рахматджон очень надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Rahmatjon is an experienced jeweler who lives in the city of Dushanbe. He is 30 years old and a family man. Rahmatjon has worked for many years creating and repairing gold and silver jewelry, and now he has enough experience to start his own business. Rahmatjon plans to take custom orders and to make jewelry repairs. He has already made agreements with vendors at the market to sell his jewelry pieces. Rahmatjon has capital in the form of a work desk, tools, and his savings, but he will also need a jewelry machine to manufacture his creations before he can open his own store. Unfortunately he does not have enough money to buy this machine because it is very expensive, so he must take out a loan before he can start his business. Rahmatjon hopes very much for support.

loans.use: to buy jewelers' tools to start a business.

loans.name: Mohamad Hussein

texts.en: Mohamad Hussein is a 20-year-old single man from Lebanon. He owns a store where he sells motorcycles. In addition, he specializes in repairing them. Regardless of his young age, Mohamad Hussein is doing his best to prove his talents, build a good business reputation and attract the maximum number of customers to visit his shop. Today, he is in need of a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase equipment needed. He states that once he possesses these tools, surely his operations will improve and provide his customers with better services.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for repairing motorcycles

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a 43-year-old, Lebanese single woman. She works as a saleswoman at a clothing store and she earns barely enough income. Mariam is very tender and cares a lot about all of her family members. 

Today, she is eager to borrow a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas. s.a.l., to pay her nephew’s educational fees. She tends to help her brother to raise his children well and to provide them with a good education. 

This is Mariam's first Kiva loan and she wants to express her thanks for it.

loans.use: to pay her nephew’s educational fees.

loans.name: Alizamin

texts.en:
Alizamin, 37 years old, is a driver. He is married and has two children. One of them is a 10-year-old son and the other is a 9-year-old daughter. His son goes to 4 class and his daughter goes to 3 class. They are IDP (internally displaced persons) from Füzuli city and now live in the Füzuli region in Ashagi-Gülzak village.

Alizamin has applied for a loan of 900 AZN for repairs to his car. He has been in business for 10 years and during these years, his car has become outdated. His car was damaged and therefore, he can’t work. He hasn't worked for a while and cannot support his family. To restore his monthly income, the car needs to be repaired. He believes that if his car is repaired, his situation will be good enough, as before, and he will be able to support his family. He thanks Kiva and Komak for supporting him .

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr: Jeune femme de 30ans, Yawa revend des produits d'alimentation générale au marché. Elle a démarré cette activité en 2009 et s'y plait bien car cela l'aide à subvenir à ses besoins. Pour augmenter son stock de marchandise, elle sollicite un second prêt. Le profit l'aidera à créer une autre boutique et assurer sa santé.
texts.en: Yawa is a young 30-year-old woman, who works reselling general food products in the market. She started this business in 2009, and is pleased with it because it helps her to provide for herself. To increase her stock of merchandise, Yawa has requested a second loan. Her profits will help her to open another store and take care of her health.

loans.use: To buy general food products.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en: Mamie is 47 years old and lives in Compound #3. She is married and her husband is a driver. They have nine children between 8 and 24 years old. Only four of her children are in school and all of them live at home. For the past 16 years, she has been operating a fast food center. She is requesting a loan to purchase oats, eggs, bread, milk, etc. for her business. She likes her business because she has more customers. Her plan is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase oats, eggs, bread, milk, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Haragakiza Group

texts.fr:
Christine  fait partie du groupe Haragakiza et  habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a  32 ans et est mariée  à Daniel, un  commerçant. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants âgés  de 1  à  3 ans, dont  2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce du riz depuis 13 ans. 

C’est  son premier  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de riz  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années à venir, elle voudrait  importer ses produits de l’Ouganda et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Christine is part of the Haragakiza group and lives in Bujumbura. She is 32 years of age and married to Daniel, a retailer. Together the couple has five children aged between 1 and 3, two of whom are at school.

Christine has worked selling rice for 13 years, and this is her first loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan she obtains, she plans to increase her capital and buy a large amount of rice to resell and earn more money. Over the coming years, Christine would like to import produce from Uganda and see her children study.

loans.use: To increase her capital and buy a large amount of rice, which she will resell to earn more money.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set, and weighing scale, so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Julia

texts.pt:
Júlia  tem 51 anos de idade é casada e mãe de seis 06 filhos dos quais  03 vivem com ela. Trabalha como empregada doméstica.
O empréstimo sera aplicado para construir uma casa de banho melhorada, para tal vai adquirir( cimento , pedra , areia e outros materiais ).

Seu sonho é de terminar a sua casa, comprar mobilia e construir murro de vedação de forma a melhorar as condições de habitacao de sua familia
texts.en:
Júlia is 51 years old, married and the mother of 6 children, 3 of whom live with her. She works as a housemaid.

This loan will be used to build an improved bathroom and to this end she will buy cement, stone, sand and other construction materials.

Her dream is to finish building her house, buy furniture and build a wall around her home so as to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: buy cement, stone, sand and other construction materials.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en: Fozia is a 32-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. She has been operating a tailoring business for the last two years to support her family. She manages her household activities, as well, while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income to her family for their everyday expenses. Currently she has requested from Kashf Foundation a loan of 35,000 PKR to purchase more spools of thread, zippers, and laces in different colors. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She is in her second loan cycle and has good credit history. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, zippers, and laces in different colors.

loans.name: Rasheeda

texts.en:
Rasheeda is a 57-year-old energetic and diligent woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along with her husband, five sons, and three daughters. Her husband owns an auto workshop and one son works as a mechanic in the workshop. Rasheeda's husband is also an efficient mechanic by profession. Three of her children are getting an education. 

Currently, at her husband's workshop, the stock of auto parts is low. Therefore, Rasheeda is interested in purchasing some parts to stock the workshop. She has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase auto parts. With the profit, she will help her husband's business more by purchasing additional parts. She dreams to live a happy, healthy, and peaceful life with her family. Many thanks and best wishes to all staff of Kiva and BRAC Pakistan from her.

loans.use: To pay for auto parts

loans.name: Arevik

texts.en:
Arevik is a very nice and pleasant girl with so beautiful a name, which is translated as a sun. Arevik lives in Sevan city with her parents and brother, who is still school-aged. 

Arevik studies at the Yerevan State Pedagogical Institute in the Department of Psychology and Sociology. Arevik studies at the distance-learning division. This nice lady also manages to work while simultaneously studying her lessons. She works at an insurance company as an insurance agent. Arevik’s father works at the local inventory and her mother is a saleswoman. 

Arevik asks for a loan of AMD 155,000 (Armenian drams) in order to pay her tuition fee for the first semester. She is a very clever and kind girl and she does her best in order to help her parents to solve their family’s financial problems and not to add new ones.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fee for the first semester.

loans.name: Joana

texts.pt:
Joana tem 33 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de dois filhos menores. 
Ela trabalha como vendedora de fatos. Este negocio é feito por encomendas e entregas . 
 Ela precisa do empréstimo para comprar capulanas e fatos para revender
 O seu maior sonho e conseguir um espaco  para comprar sua propria casa. Porem seu maior desafio e de cuidar dos seus filhos
texts.en:
Joana is 33 years old, single and the mother of two children who are still minors.

She sells suits for a living. This business is carried out through orders and deliveries.

She needs this loan to buy traditional Mozambican cloths and suits to resell.

Her biggest dream is to obtain a space to buy her own house. However, her biggest challenge is to look after her children.

loans.use: buy traditional Mozambican cloths and suits to resell.

loans.name: Ivone

texts.pt:
A Ivone de 43 anos de idade é solteira e mae de 02  filhos ambos frequentando o ensino secundario. A sua base de sustento é o negoio que faz desde o ano de 2005. Ela e vendedora ambulante durante o dia e faz algumas entregas aos clientes. 
Ela precisa do emprestimo para comprar camas, roupas diversas e productos cosmeticos para revender.
O seu maior sonho é construir uma vivenda para arrendar, e os eu maior desafio é de fazer poupansas  para conseguir comprar material  de construcao.
texts.en:
Ivone is 43 years old, single and the mother of 2 children, who both go to secondary school. The foundation of her income is her business which she has had since 2005. She's a travelling salesperson during the day and makes deliveries to clients.

She needs this loan to buy beds, various clothes and cosmetics to resell.

Her biggest dream is to build a house to rent out and her biggest challenge is to save enough money to buy construction material.

loans.use: buy beds, various clothes and cosmetics to resell.

loans.name: Marcelino

texts.es: El señor Marcelino, es una persona de 24  años de edad de estado civil soltero pero  actualmente ya vive en concubinato, con un nivel de instrucción hasta la primaria, cuenta con un dependiente económico a cargo el cual es su único hijo, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico construido con material local, que se halla ubicado en la comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica principal del señor Marcelino es la producción agrícola en tal sentido anualmente produce los siguientes productos agrícolas; papa 80 cargas, haba (verde) 25 cargas, trigo (grano) 5 quintales y finalmente maíz (grano) 2 cargas los cuales son cultivados en sus propios terreno agrícolas, con la venta de estos productos agrícolas sustenta a su familia económicamente, por ello el señor Marcelino solicita capital de operación para la compra de insumos agrícola, de tal forma en el futuro poder mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en: Marcelino is 24 years old, and is not married but lives in a common-law relationship.  He has a primary school education.  He has one dependant child.  He lives in his own home, which is a rustic house built from local materials and is located in the community of Tiraque.  Marcelino's main business is agriculture.  He produces the following products on an annual basis:  80 loads of potatoes, 25 loads of (green) fava beans, 5 quintals of wheat (grain), and finally 2 loads of corn (grain).  He grows his products on his own land, and supports his family by selling them.  Marcelino is requesting working capital to buy agricultural supplies, so as to improve his future economic circumstances.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Ernazar

texts.ru:
Эрназар мужчина в возрасте 43 лет имеет 5 детей. Он занимается откормом скота в течении 15 лет. В свое время он добился обучения в ВУЗ-е и тем самым устроился в гос.учреждение инженером.  Откорм скота имеет сезонный характер и поэтому он с женой работают, что бы иметь дополнительный  доход. У них уже дети взрослые и родители хотят чтобы они поступили в ВУЗ и в будущем работали по профессии. Для этого Эрназар с женой работают не покладая рук. Откорм скота дает очень хороший доход,поэтому он старается развивать этот бизнес. 
Эрназар планирует купить дополнительно скот но пока у него на руках нет нужной суммы. Он решил обратиться в организацию Арванд за кредитом. Эрназар надеется, что Арванд ему поможет и финансово поддержит.
texts.en:
Ernazar is 43 years old and has 5 children.  Some time ago, he finished his post-secondary studies and was able to land a government job as an engineer.   Additionally, he has been fattening cattle for the past 15 years; fattening cattle has a seasonal character to it, and serves to provide additional income for Ernazar and his wife.  Their children have already grown up, and their parents want them to go to college and work in whichever fields they decide to go into.  Ernazar and his wife work very hard to make sure their children have this opportunity.  

Fattening cattle is an excellent source of income, so Ernazar is trying his best to expand his cattle-fattening business.  He would like to buy additional cattle, but he lacks the money to do so; he is thus seeking a loan from Arvand, ands hopes they will be able to help and financially support him.

loans.use: buy cattle for fattening.

loans.name: Edras Omar

texts.es: Edras, tiene 20 años, está soltero y vive con sus padres en el municipio de Gracias Lempiras. Hace 7 años se dedica a la agricultura ayudándole a su padres. Ahora ya cuenta con sus propios cultivos de café. La parcela la tiene en la montaña y la producción que saca la vende en el mercado local. El préstamo que solicita ya es el segundo ciclo con la institución y es por 25,000 Lempiras, el cual lo va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra para la siembra de 2 manzanas mas de café y poder obtener mejores ingresos. Su meta es ayudar a su madre  y seguir creciendo con el negocio.
texts.en:
Edras is 20 years old, single, and lives with his parents in the municipality of Gracias in the department of Lempira. Seven years ago, he started working in agriculture by helping his parents. Today, he has his own crop of coffee. Edras’s crop is on the mountain, and he sells the coffee he produces in the local market.

This is Edras’s second loan with the field partner. He will use the 25,000 HNL to buy fertilizers and pay for labor to plant two manzanas [Central American unit of land measurement] of coffee to improve his income. Edras says that his goal is to help his mother and continue expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor to plant coffee.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena, de 58 años de edad, está casada con Roberto quien es artesano y padre de sus 2 hijos. El negocio que tiene Elena  es la venta de productos comestibles en general como arroz, azúcar, pan, huevos, leche, harina, condimentos, aceite, gaseosas y otros. Para eso estableció una tienda en su casa propia. Atiende amablemente a sus clientes desde muy temprano y afortunadamente le va muy bien. Ya tiene 02 años dedicándose a este trabajo y ha logrado crecer a base de mucho esfuerzo y en todo este tiempo ha podido consolidar una buena clientela. Trabaja sola aunque en algunas ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su hija. Considera que su negocio es rentable por las ganancias que a diario obtiene por todas sus ventas. Su negocio le permite estar en casa para poder atender a sus nietos ya que los quiere mucho y vela por ellos, además los ingresos económicos que obtiene le sirven para comprar todo lo que hace falta en su hogar. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, está contenta de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero que le permite avanzar con el progreso de su negocio. Asegura que será puntal con el pago de sus cuotas para que más adelante pueda tener accesos a mayores préstamos. Con el monto solicitado comprará productos comestibles al por mayor tales como azúcar, arroz, aceites y otros.
texts.en: Elena is 58 years old and is married to Roberto, an artisan, and the father of Elena's two children.  Elena has a business selling consumable goods, such as rice, sugar, eggs, bread, milk, flour, condiments, oil, fizzy drinks, and more.  She runs the store out of her home, serving her customers in a friendly manner and, fortunately, the business is going well.  Elena has been doing this work for two years and she has grown a lot due to the big effort she has made.  During these past years Elena has established a good customer base.  Elena works alone but she sometimes receives help form her children.  Elena believes she has a profitable business because she is earning from her all her sales every day.  The business allows Elena to be at home to look after her grandchildren, whom she loves very much and keeps watch over.  In addition, her income helps Elena to buy all the things that she needs for her house.  On this occasion Elena is applying for a loan of 1000 Nuevo Soles.  She is happy to have financial support that will allow her to make her business progress more.  Elena assures us that she will be punctual with her repayments so that, in the future, she can take out larger loans.  Elena will use this loan to buy consumable products, such as rice, sugar, oil, and more, in bulk.

loans.use: to buy consumable products such as sugar, rice, and oil.

loans.name: Ever Orlando

texts.es: Don Ever,tiene 42 años de edad, esta casado y vive con su esposa con quien tiene tres hijos, y reside en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. don Ever trabajo por varios años en una entidad municipal, pero al quedar sin empleo decidió poner su propio negocio de venta de jugos naturales y golosinas como churros, dulces y otros. El préstamo que solicita es por 5,000 y lo va invertir en la compra de naranjas, azúcar y bolsas para hacer los jugos y con otra parte va comprar bloques y varillas para hacer un arranque donde va empezar a construir su casa. Su plan es seguir obteniendo ganancias para terminar de construir la casa para no seguir alquilando y seguir manejando el negocio.
texts.en: Ever is 42 years old, married and lives with his wife, with whom he has three children.  They live in the Tela municipality of Atlántida.  Ever worked for a number of years with a local organisation but, after losing his job, he decided to start his own business selling fruit juices, and sweets, such as churros and other items.  Ever is applying for a loan of 5000 Lempira which he will use to buy oranges, sugar, and bags, to make juices.  He will also buy blocks and bars to make a start on building his house.  Ever's plan is to continue making a profit so that he can finish his house and stop renting.  He also wants to continue running his business.

loans.use: to buy oranges, sugar, and bags, to make juices; and to buy blocks and bars to make a start on building his house.

loans.name: Bernardino

texts.es: Bernardino, tiene 54 años de edad, está soltero y vive con sus dos hijos mayores en el municipio de Gracias Lempira. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de granos básicos y al cultivo de café. este cultivo lo tiene en un terreno en la montaña y la producción que saca es vendida en el mercado local de la misma zona. El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 8,000 Lempira y lo va utilizar en la compra de fertilizantes para asistir mas la finca de café. Este préstamo le ayudara porque al fertilizar tendrá una buena producción. Su meta es seguir superándose como persona, ayudar a sus hijos con el estudio y seguir creciendo con el negocio.
texts.en: Bernardino is 54 years, single and lives with his two oldest children in the Gracias Lempira municipality.  Bernardino has always made a living growing basic grains and coffee.  He has these crops on a plot of land in the mountains and sells his harvest at the local market.  Bernardino will use this loan of 8000 Lempira to buy fertilisers to help his coffee crops.  This loan will help Bernardino as, with fertiliser, he will have a good yield.  Bernardino's goal is to continue to do better than before.  He also wants to help his children with their education and to continue growing with his business.

loans.use: to fertilisers to maintain his coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set, and weighing scale, so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.es: El señor Rogelio, es una persona de 22 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, con nivel de instrucción hasta el bachillerato, cuenta con un dependiente económico a su cargo el cual es su pequeño hijo, vive en la vivienda de sus padres, la vivienda es de tipo rustico construido con material local, que se halla ubicado en la comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica principal del señor Rogelio  es la producción agrícola en tal sentido anualmente produce los siguientes productos agrícolas; papa 120 cargas, haba (verde) 30 cargas, avena (forraje) 12 calchas  los cuales son cultivados en sus propios terrenos agrícolas y en los terrenos de su padre sin costo alguno. con la venta de estos productos sustenta a su familia económica, por ello el señor Rogelio solicita capital de operación para la compra de insumos agrícola y semovientes.
texts.en: Rogelio is 22 years old, single, and has a bachelor’s degree.  He has a young son who depends on him financially.  [Rogelio] lives at his parents’ home, a rustic house made from local materials, and located in the Tíraque community.  Rogelio’s main financial activity is farming and he annually raises 120 bushels of potatoes, 30 bushels of green beans, and 12 beds of oats (fodder) on his own farmland and on his father’s without cost.  The sale of these products supports his family financially.  Rogelio is asking for working capital to buy supplies and livestock.

loans.use: to buy supplies and livestock.

loans.name: Sumera

texts.en:
Sumera is a 29-year-old married woman. She has recently opened a small vegetable shop in her community with the support of her husband who purchases vegetables from the local market at wholesale rates. Sumera then she sells the vegetables in her locality.  Sumera has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide for her family. 

As she wants to grow her business, Sumera requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy stock of onions, potatoes and ginger from the market at lower wholesale rates. She then would be able to meet the increasing demands of her customers consistently. Sumera wishes to utilize her revenues to deal with personal expenses and to increase business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of onions, potatoes and ginger.

loans.name: Ruhsora

texts.ru: Рухсора родилась в 1994 года. Она замужем. Рухсора еще не имеет детей. Она трудолюбивая женщина. Рухсора родилась в сельской местности и поэтому с детства она помогала родителям по выращиванию сельхоз культур. Она после окончания средней школы поступила в университет. В свободное от учебы время она занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур и таким образом зарабатывает на жизнь. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Рухсора в основном занимается выращиванием картофеля, помидоры и морковь. Она живет в старом домике и ей срочно надо до наступления зимы отремонтировать дом. Однако ее муж не отправил деньги. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, краски и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Ruhsora was born in 1994.  She is married, and has yet to have any children.  Upon finishing secondary school, she enrolled in a university, where she currently studies.  She is a hardworking woman; apart from her university studies, she grows crops for a living.  She was born in an agricultural town, and, as a child, would help her parents plant crops and tend to them.  These days, she generally grows potatoes, tomatoes, and carrots.  

Ruhsora lives in an old house which is in urgent need of repairs before winter.  Her husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation, but has yet to send any money back home.  She is requesting a loan of 7500 somoni to buy building materials such as cement, paint, and the like for repairing her home, and is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: buy building materials such as cement, paint, etc. for repairing her small house

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John lives in the Kisii area of Kenya, which is a scarce of available land. He has 3 children and been doing this work for 5 years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, and personal business.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'Milking his cows.' His biggest challenge is: 'Finding feeds which are expensive.' Animals on the farm have been given the name of 'Nyaboke.'

John was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: 'Because of their good training.' This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'That savings are continuous and compulsory.'

His highest monthly expenses are school fees. When asked 'How will this loan benefit his family', John replied 'The income will increase.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. John owns the following: 'cow and poultry' but does not own 'pig, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, or automobile'. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net and DVD,' but does not have 'electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, or TV'.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Victoria Elisa

texts.es: Victoria es una mujer emprendedora y activa; a sus 41 años de edad ya ha realizado cursos de decoración de fiestas, lencería, artículos de decoración en arte country y, actualmente realiza un curso de capacitación en comercialización de calzado y ropa. Se encuentra desempleada y por ello desea iniciar su propio negocio con el ánimo de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar; desea vender ropa y calzado ya que así podrá poner en práctica lo aprendido en los estudios que realiza. Su empuje y su espíritu de superación la impulsan a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor (blusas, camisetas, jeans, sandalias, zapatos) con la que podrá poner en marcha su proyecto productivo y del que espera obtener buenos resultados, pues tendrá gran variedad de prendas para satisfacer las necesidades y gustos de su clientela tanto masculina como femenina. Los ingresos que genere de sus ventas serán direccionados a aportar para el sostenimiento de su familia, conformada por su esposo y tres hijos, quienes son su principal motivación para salir adelante y por los que lucha incansablemente para darles siempre un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Victoria, 41, is an enterprising, active woman who has taken courses in party decoration, lingerie, country themed decorations and is currently taking a course on footwear and clothing sales.  She’s unemployed and this is why she wants to start her own business to generate income to contribute towards household expenses.  She wants to sell clothes and footwear because she’ll be able to put into practice what she’s learned in the courses she’s taking that way.

Her drive and self-improvement spirit encourage her to request support from a loan to use to buy merchandise at wholesale (blouses, t-shirts, jeans, sandals, shoes) to launch her business venture that she hopes to get good results from for she’ll have a wide variety of articles of clothing to meet the needs and desires of both the women and the men in her clientele.

Income generated from sales will be aimed at helping to support her family consisting of her husband and three children who are her main motivators to get ahead and for whom she strives tirelessly to provide the best possible well-being and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Yusuf

texts.en:
Yusuf lives in the Kisii area of Kenya, which has scarce available land. He has five children and has been doing this work for seven years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, crops and salary from a job.

He stated what is most enjoyable about farming: 'Feeding cows.' His biggest challenge is 'Changes in weather which affect animals.' Animals on the farm have been given the names of 'Nyasuguta.'

Yusuf was asked why he chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which he replied: 'Because of low intrest rate.' This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required micro-finance training session: 'That the group members guarantee each other.'

His highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked 'How will this loan benefit his family', Yusuf replied 'They will have more milk and eggs for sale.'

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Yusuf owns the following: 'cow, poultry' but does not own 'pig, pump, bicycle, motorcycle, automobile.' Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household 'mosquito net' but does not have 'electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV, DVD.'

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline lives in the Kisii area of Kenya, which is scarce of available land. She has 3 children and has been doing this work for 3 years. Her primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, and crops.

Jackline stated that what is most enjoyable about farming is "milking cows" and that her biggest challenge is "pests and diseases." Animals on the farm have been given the names of "Nyanunguti."

Jackline was asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, to which she replied, "'Because of dairy financing."  This client was also asked what was learned during Juhudi Kilimo's required micro-finance training session and she stated, "Members take loans according  to their ability to pay."

Jackline's highest monthly expense is farming costs. When asked how the loan will benefit her family, Jackline replied, "The children will get school fees."

As part of Juhudi Kilimo's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Jackline owns a cow and poultry, but does not own a pig, a pump, a bicycle, a motorcycle, or an automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household a mosquito net, but does not have electricity, solar power, running water, a sewing machine, a TV, or a DVD player.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Romana

texts.en:
Romana, age 26, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income.

She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase two more goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Elshan

texts.en: Elshan is a 30-year-old married man. He lives with his wife, mother and brother in a small village in the Marneuli district. Elshan gets orders and makes different kinds of furniture. This is the only source of income which is not enough for his four-member family. He requested a loan to start a family business.The start-up loan program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of $3,000 to purchase sheep and a cow. The family will start producing cheese and generate income.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Shabnam

texts.en:
Shabnam, age 28, deals in the business of animals sales and purchase to bear her household expenses efficiently. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them out in the market at higher prices.

She is a mother of three, and wants to provide them with good quality education, health and clothing. For the improvement of her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase two more goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Ray

texts.es: Ray, de 43 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y empeñoso, además de alegre y sociable. Está casado con Delia quien es ama de casa y madre de sus 4 hijos a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida.  Vive en compañía de su familia en su casa propia. Ray se dedica a la venta de repuestos para motos y mototaxis, brinda servicio de vulcanizado, cambio de aceite, lubricación, bajada de motor y otras funciones. Además compra y vende vehículos menores de segundo uso a los cuales arregla, repara y los deja en óptimas condiciones para que pueda ofrecerlos a buen precio. Para desarrollar esta actividad cuenta con un local propio acondicionado en su casa en donde pone a la venta todos los repuestos que se requieren sus clientes como pistones, bujía, aros, llantas, tapabarros, telescopios, faros, frenos, etc. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tienen sus productos gracias al constante crecimiento del sector vehicular de motos y mototaxis en la ciudad donde vive. Le gusta su negocio porque siente que es el resultado de su esfuerzo y empeño. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está contento de saber que tiene un apoyo financiero que le permite avanzar con el progreso de su negocio. Con el monto solicitado comprará repuestos de motos como ejes, llantas, bujías y frenos que son los productos mas solicitados, asimismo obtendrá una moto de segundo uso para luego ponerlo a la venta.
texts.en:
Ray is 43 years old and married to Delia, with whom he has four children. He lives with them in his own home, and he strives to give them a better quality of life. Ray is described as hard-working, friendly and cheerful. He works selling parts for motorcycles and motorcycle taxis, and he does tire repairs, oil changes, lube jobs, engine overhauls and other services. Ray also buys and sells small second-hand vehicles, which he restores to optimal condition so that he can resell them at a good price.

Ray runs his business from his own air-conditioned shop attached to his home. He displays the parts that his customers need, such as pistons and rings, spark plugs, tires, mud flaps, telescopic forks, headlamps and brakes. Ray thinks that his business does very well because the number of motorcycles and motorcycle taxis in the city is constantly increasing and there is a high demand for his products. Ray says that he enjoys his business because he knows it is the result of his hard work and dedication.

Ray is requesting this loan for 1,500 PEN to buy motorcycle parts such as axels, tires, spark plugs and brakes, which are the parts his customers ask for most. He also wants to buy a second-hand motorcycle so he can put it up for sale. Rays says that he is happy knowing that he can count on financial support to move ahead with his business.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts such as axels, tires, spark plugs and brakes.

loans.name: Maria Celia

texts.es: María, de 62 años de edad habita en casa  propia junto a su hermana quien depende de sus cuidados. María se dedica  a la venta de pescado, la venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes  zonas de su comunidad. Su principal  patrimonio es su humilde vivienda que con el tiempo ha venido mejorando para protegerse de las lluvias y el sol. Solicita a FUSAI este crédito para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera ya que el techo se encuentra deteriorado  y no logran cubrir sus pertenencias de las lluvias. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y hacer el cambio de techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: María, 62, lives in her own house with her sister who depends on her for her care.  María works selling fish from place to place throughout her community.  Her main asset is her humble abode that’s been improving over time to protect herself from the rain and the sun.  She’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, nails and lumber because the roof is deteriorated and unable to protect her belongings from the rain.  She hopes to be able to count on this financing in order to replace the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Seratta

texts.en:
Seratta lives in Compound # 3. She is 47 years old, married, and has six children between 14 and 26 years old; only three of them are in school and live at home. Her husband is a businessman. 

For the past 3 years, she has been selling palm oil and rice. She started this business with sell pay (the Liberian way of doing business. When you don’t have money, sell the goods, return the principle, and have the profit).

Some problem she is facing is having less money. She is requesting a loan to purchase palm oil and rice for her business. She learned this way of trade from her mother. She likes it because it makes her serious and strong, and its the fast way of getting money. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and rice for her business.

loans.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es:
Doña María Erlinda es una mujer luchadora, emprendedora y muy dedicada a su trabajo y su familia con 46 años de edad, casada y madre de 2 hijos los cuales están en la primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Ella tiene un grado de educación secundario completo la cual se graduó como maestra de educación primaria la cual ejerce en una escuela de la comunidad y mientras no está en la escuela apoya a su esposo en los trabajos de la tierra en lo que es limpieza, aplicación de abono, foliares, etc. Ella aprendió dichas actividades a muy temprana edad ya que fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra siendo ellos agricultores por toda una vida. Las diferentes actividades en sus cultivos son elaboradas por ellos 2 y juntos son apoyo mutuo en la agricultura como unión familiar los cuales están ubicados cerca de su casa. Su producto es comercializado y vendido en el mercado local en pequeña escala con los diferentes vendedores de la zona. 
Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de insumos que mejoraran sus cultivos de café ya que por medio de esto ella podrá asegurar sus cosechas y el producto para generar ingresos para su familia.
Sus planes y metas a futuro son de ampliar sus cultivos comprando más tierra en la que ella pueda trabajar y fortalecer el patrimonio para sus futuros hijos venideros. Su sueño es ver a sus hijos realizados y estudiados a nivel universitario ya que de esa forma ella podrá prepararlos académicamente y dando en ellos seguridad y confianza para desenvolverse en un futuro.
texts.en:
María Erlinda’s a hardworking, enterprising woman who is very dedicated to her work and to her family.  She’s 46-years-old, married and mother of two children who are in different grades in primary school.  She completed secondary school and graduated as a primary school teacher.  She teaches at a local primary school and when she’s not at school helps her husband with field chores like weeding, applying manure and leaf fertilizer, etc.  She learned said tasks at a very young age for her parents taught her to work the land since they’ve worked in agriculture their entire lives.  She and her husband do the various field chores together and support each other in agriculture as a family unit; their fields are near their house.  Her product is sold and traded in the local market in a small scale to various local sellers.

She’s currently asking for help to buy supplies that will improve her coffee crop and insure a good harvest to generate family income.  Her plans and future goals are to expand her acreage buying more land to work and to strengthen her future children's estate.  Her dream is to see her children fulfilled and graduated from university since this is the way to form them academically and give them the security and confidence to be able to flourish in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Hajira

texts.en: Hajira is 40 years old and a vigorous mother of four children. She has been stitching clothes for five years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. Hajira has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenue so she may generate more income. She expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend the part of profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Kosar

texts.en: Kosar is a 37-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store for the last four years. She makes a good income to meet her household's expenses. She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health care. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 35,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is hopeful to increase her income and wishes to expand her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 41 year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She has been doing a business of dry fruits sales for the past 16 years. Her husband also works selling dry fruits, and in this way she is able to handle her family needs and requirements effectively. She is contentedly doing it for the sake of her family. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. Naseem has requested a loan of RS 20,000 to purchase more stock of peanuts, walnuts and almonds. It will help her to inflate her sales. She dreams of providing a good lifestyle to her family.

loans.use: to purchase stock of peanuts, walnuts and almonds.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad desde hace 16 años, junto a su esposa y nieta de 10 años de edad. Juan se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de cerdos,  de esta forma lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Es un hombre comprometido, trabajador y muy responsable, para él lo más importante es que su familia esté cómoda y  segura. Su casa es muy humilde que con mucho esfuerzo va mejorando gracias a las ayudas que recibe de instituciones financieras. En esta ocasión se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un pequeño préstamo que le permita invertir en la compra de puertas ya que tal como se muestra en la fotografía no ha logrado comprarlas y sus ingresos no le alcanzan para hacerlo  por su cuenta.  Además quiere  comprar lámina galvanizada para hacer una división dentro de su casa.  De esta forma quiere darle a su familia un hogar cálido y seguro.
texts.en:
Juan, 54, has lived  in his own house for 16 years with his wife and 10-year-old granddaughter.  He works in agriculture and selling pigs; this is how he supports his home.  He’s a committed, hardworking, very responsible man.  What’s most important to him is that his family is safe and comfortable.

His house is very humble and with much effort he’s been improving it with help he gets from financial institutions.  On this occasion, he approached FUSAI to request a small loan that will make it possible for him to buy doors for as shown in the photo he’s been unable to buy them so far and his income is insufficient to do so on his own.  He also wants to buy galvanized metal sheets to make an interior division and provide a warm, safe home for his family.

loans.use: to buy doors for his house.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es: Rosa, de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está constituido por su esposo y sus dos hijos.  Se dedica a la venta de queso en las diferentes zonas de su comunidad.  Rosa es muy conocida en su comunidad gracias a los buenos productos  y precios  que ofrece.  Cuenta con una vivienda muy humilde pero muy orgullosa porque junto a su esposo han logrado tener un espacio donde vivir. Actualmente las láminas del techo de su casa se encuentran deterioradas  y necesitan urgentemente un cambio ya que el agua de las lluvias se filtra y sus hijos y pertenencias se ven expuestos  a la humedad. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, clavos, y madera. Espera poder contar con la ayuda y dar solución lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Rosa, 39, lives in her own house with her immediate family consisting of her husband and two children.  She works selling cheese in various parts of her community.  Rosa’s very well-known in her community thanks to the good products and affordable prices she has.  

She has a very humble home but she’s proud because she and her husband together have succeeded in having a place to live.  The metal sheets that make up the roof are currently rotten and urgently need to be replaced because rain leaks in and her children and her belongings are exposed to the dampness.  She’s therefore made the decision to ask FUSAI for this loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, nails and lumber.  She hopes to get this help so she can provide a solution to this as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 37-year-old married woman. She is a very talented lady, and has been successfully running stitching work in her community for the past 10 years. 

Her husband lost his one arm in an accident. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet their household expenses or the educational needs of their children. 

She has good communication skills and client list. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Shazia wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase more reels of threads with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors to meet the increasing demands of her customers. 

She hopes to grow her business, and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Ararat

texts.en:
Ararat is from Yerevan, where he lives with his wife and son. Ararat has been involved in the retail business for many years. His son works at a local copper molybdenum (chemical element) production company and supports the family's living.
But the main income of the family comes from the retail business in which Ararat has been involved. He purchases scrap metals (particularly copper) and sells it to local companies or factories. Due to his hard work and good communication skills, Ararat has several contracts with companies that are purchasing copper from him. So he purchases copper from individuals and sells it to local companies, thus gathering income from the difference. Now Ararat needs financial support to be able to purchase new stock of copper and sell it to customers.

He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. So the loan is very important for Ararat to be able to continue his retail business, and he will be very grateful to all his lenders for the support.

loans.use: new stock of copper to sell to customers

loans.name: Tatevik

texts.en:
Tatevik is 35 years old. She lives in Vanadzor city, which is in Lori region. Tatevik is not married, and she lives with her retired parents. Since 2011, she has run her own clothes trading business. She has rented a stall where she sells clothes for women, teenagers, newborns and children. She brings all the clothes she sells from the wholesale markets of Yerevan city. Tatevik is the only breadwinner in her family, and with her business she manages to properly take care of her parents and pay for their everyday needs. She is a very successful business woman since she has many loyal customers and she gives very high quality service.
