Tatevik asks for a loan of 900,000 Armenian drams to buy a lot of autumn-winter season clothes for her business.

loans.use: to buy autumn-winter clothes for her business

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza de 20 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 11 meses.  Maritza se dedica al negocio de tienda en la cual vende azúcar, aceite, golosinas, etc. Su compañero de vida es jornalero y  le ayuda en la economía del hogar. Maritza desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que por el tiempo las lluvias y el sol se ha deteriorado. Es por esta razón que se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar este préstamo y poder comprar lo necesario  como: lámina galvanizada, clavos, madera, etc. De esta forma espera darle un lugar más seguro a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en: Maritza is 20 years old and lives in her own home with her life companion and her 11 month old child. Maritza's business is a store where she sells sugar, oil, sweets, etc. Her life companion is a day laborer who also contributes to the household economy. Maritza wants to replace her roof of her house as over time it has deteriorated from the rain and sun. For this reason she has approached FUSAI to request this loan and be able to buy what she needs:  galvanized sheeting, nails, wood, etc. She hopes by doing this to give her young child a more secure place to live.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails, wood, etc.

loans.name: Candida

texts.es: Cándida, de 60 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su familia desde hace 27 años. Ella es una mujer responsable, trabajadora pero sobre todo emprendedora.  Desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de queso, tamales y pan francés. Es muy activa dentro de su comunidad  y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona como una mujer respetable,  responsable y honrada. Ella posee  su casita pero necesita algunas mejoras ya que sus ingresos no le han permitido terminar algunos detalles. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar laminas y reparar el techo ya que con el tiempo se han deteriorado, además, necesita hacer un pasamano para asegurar el paso de las gradas ya que como se muestra en la fotografía es un área muy insegura y no hay nada para sostenerse.
texts.en:
Cándida, 60, has lived with her family in her own house for 27 years.  She’s a responsible, hardworking, enterprising woman.  She’s sold cheese, tamales and French bread for many years.  She’s very active in her community and many people give her good personal references as a respectable, responsible, honest woman.

She owns her house but it needs some improvements but her income hasn’t been sufficient for her to finish some details.  She’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy metal sheets to repair the roof because it’s become deteriorated over time.  She also needs to build a banister on the staircase because, as shown in the photo, it’s a very unsafe area and there’s no way to hold on.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en: Shamim is a 48-year-old, married woman and a mother of three. She has been running a cloth business for the last five years. She purchases a variety of cloths from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has good communication skills and has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. Shamim requested a loan of PKR 35,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different cloths for the winter season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. Shamim hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different cloths for the winter season.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 30-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. They make good amount of income to bear their household expenses. They have four children and want to provide them with good quality food, clothing and health. Naseem wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PK 30,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demands of her customers. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Kishwer

texts.en: Kishwer is a 35-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. She offers a variety of grocery items and has become famous in the locality for providing good quality products.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts in years. She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PK 35,000 to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand of her customers. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages

loans.name: Prospero

texts.es: Prospero, de 71 años, es viudo y tiene cuatro hijos los cuales ya son independientes. Vive en su casa propia. EL trabajo de Prospero como actividad principal consiste en la siembra de plátano, papaya, piña, entre otros. También se dedica a la  reparación de motores electrógenos, motos, maquinarias y otros, el hace su trabajo de forma delivery va a donde le llamen y a la hora que lo soliciten, lleva haciendo este trabajo por más 20 años, es muy bueno en lo que hace y es por eso que siempre lo llaman para solucionar los problemas de las maquinas de sus clientes. Lo que le gusta de suS trabajoS es que puede generar ingresos para su hogar,  además de tener un horario que el mismo maneja. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva, por ello solicita de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado 4000 nuevos soles comprará semillas, abono orgánico para su sembríos.
texts.en:
Prospero is 71 years old, widowed, and lives in his own home. He has four grown children. Prospero works growing plantains, papaya, pineapples and other crops. He also repairs electric motors, motorcycles, appliances and other devices. Prospero has been working as an in-home repairman for more than 20 years, traveling to his customers whenever and wherever they call on him. Prospero is known for being very good at what he does, and he says that people always call him to fix their broken appliances. Prospero says that he likes his jobs because he makes money to cover his expenses and he sets his own schedule.

This is Prospero’s first Kiva loan. He says that it will allow him to carry out his plans, and he promises to make his payments on time. Prospero will use this loan for 4,000 PEN to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia is a 23-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a business of flower making for the last year. She offers various colorful flowers for decorating homes and events like birthdays, parties, etc. She sells them to the people of her community and also supplies in the local market.  She has good communication skills and has a good client list. She is motivated to provide for her family. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy raw material such as fabric, tissue papers and glace papers along with packs of paints in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet with the increasing demands of her customers consistently. She is in her third loan cycle, with good credit history. She wishes to spend part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her family and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy raw material such as fabric, tissue papers and glace papers along with packs of paints in various colors.

loans.name: Suria

texts.en: Suria is a 53 year-old married woman and a mother of six children. For the past three years, she has been running a business selling milk. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread winner at that point in time. With the passage of time, her sales increased and also her income. Now she has two buffaloes and one cow. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of 35,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Yesi Yamileth

texts.es: Yesi tiene 24 años de edad  está casada y tiene  un hijo de  dos años.  Ella posee un pequeño salón de belleza en donde corta y plancha cabello. Su compañero de vida le ayuda con la economía del hogar y juntos  mantienen a su familia. Su vivienda es muy humilde pero propia y junto a su esposo la van mejorando poco a poco. Ha solicitado este crédito a FUSAI para construir el cuarto del baño sanitario ya que el que posee es de madera y no es muy seguro; desea hacerlo de ladrillo para que tenga más resistencia y protección. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de arena, ladrillo y cemento. Espera poder contar con esta ayuda y así mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yesi, 24, is married and has a two-year-old son.  She has a small beauty salon where she cuts and straightens hair.  Her life companion helps her with household expenses and they support their family together.  

Her house is very humble but it’s hers and she and her husband have been gradually making improvements to it.  She’s asked FUSAI for a loan to build a bathroom because the one she currently has is wood and not very safe.  She wants to build it out of brick so that it will be more resistant and safer.  She will use the loan to buy sand, bricks and cement.  She hopes to get this help in order to improve the conditions at home.

loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Sabas Damian

texts.es: Sabas, de 40 años de edad habita  en casa propia desde hace 40 años junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus dos hijas de 7 y 2 años de edad y un hijo de 4 años.  Sabas cuenta con un pequeño empleo en una panadería de su comunidad  y junto a su esposa quien tiene un negocio de tortillas (preparación alimenticia de masa de maíz) llevan el sustento a su hogar para mantener a sus hijos.  Es un hombre muy trabajador y dedicado y quiere lo mejor para su familia. Su principal posesión es su vivienda  que poco a poco ha venido arreglando para darle mayor seguridad a su familia. En esta ocasión desea mejorar las paredes  de su casa así como el piso que es de tierra y quiere poner ladrillo  para que sus hijos tengan un lugar más higiénico para jugar. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de: cemento, arena, ladrillo de piso, etc. Y hacer las mejoras respectivas.
texts.en:
Sabas, 40, has lived in his own house for 40 years alongside his immediate family consisting of his wife and two daughters who are 7 and 2 years old and a 4-year-old son.  Sabas relates that he has a small job at a local bakery and he also has a tortilla shop with his wife.  They bring sustenance home to support their children.  He’s a hardworking, dedicated man who wants the best for his family.  

His main asset is his house which he’s gradually been improving to provide increased security for his family.  On this occasion, he wants to improve the walls as well as the dirt floor; he wants to install bricks so that his children will have a more hygienic place to play.  This is why he’s asking FUSAI for this loan in order to buy cement, sand, paving stones, etc. and make the respective improvements.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Khalida is a married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband in the corner of her house. She has 10 years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts over the years. She is the mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 Pakistani rupees to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demands of her customers. She is in her third loan cycle with a good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Hamidan

texts.en:
Hamidan is a 28-year-old married woman.  She has been running a business selling milk for the past four years. 

She has two cows giving milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life. 

She has three children; she is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day to day expenses of life.  

Currently she requested for a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase one more cow. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Memoona

texts.en: Memoona is 37 years old and works from home as a tailor. She has been in this line of work for many years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Memoona was not earning, her family went through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. Her husband was the sole breadwinner of the family so she felt it obligatory to change her family’s living standards and started working from home. She is a brave woman, and her hard work helped her establish a good clientele, but she was having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. Memoona has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of thread. She dreams of giving a good-quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of thread.

loans.name: Remani

texts.en:
Remani is a 55-year-old married woman who has run a business selling milk with her husband for the past 10 years. She has two buffaloes and sells their milk to many people of her locality. She looks after the buffaloes and performs the task of collecting milk from them while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis.  She needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures, including food, clothing and education. 

In order to make larger profits, Remani requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers. She is in her sixth loan cycle with good repayment history. She hopes to increase the production of milk, which ultimately will help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to buy another buffalo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela, tiene  57 años de edad y habita  junto a su hijo.  Ella es divorciada y desde que su pareja faltó es quien ha sido el sostén de su hogar. Gracias a sus esfuerzos ha logrado sacar a su hijo adelante. Ángela se dedica a la elaboración de comales, ollas y recipientes de barro; estos productos los vende dentro de su comunidad. Es muy emprendedora y responsable y cada día busca la forma de dar mejores condiciones a su hijo. Cuenta con una  casita muy humilde pero propia y con muchos esfuerzos la ha ido mejorando. Necesita hacer cambio de techo y mejorar las condiciones del piso, es por esto que se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar este crédito que le permita comprar lámina galvanizada, clavos, madera, arena y cemento para hacer las mejoras necesarias.
texts.en:
Ángela, 57, lives with her son.  She’s divorced and since her spouse left she’s been her home’s sole source of support.  Thanks to her efforts she’s been able to move her son ahead.  Ángela works making griddles, pots and clay vessels that she sells in her community.  She’s very enterprising and responsible and seeks ways to improve her son’s conditions every day.

Her house is very humble but it’s hers and with much effort she’s been improving it.  She needs to replace the roof and make improvements to the floor which is why she approached FUSAI to request this loan to buy galvanized steel sheets, nails, lumber, sand and cement to make the necessary improvements.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es: Mariana de 38 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su pequeño hijo de 9 años. Es madre soltera y gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo ha logrado mantener su hogar. Ella es artesana, todos los días se dedica a la elaboración de comales y ollas de barro, estos productos los vende dentro de su comunidad y es así como logra sacar el sustento para su familia. Tiene 30 años de contar con su casita la cual con muchos esfuerzos va mejorando, en esta ocasión ha tomado la decisión de hacer el cambio de las puertas las cuales son de madera y con las lluvias y el sol se han dañado, por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI,  para mandar hacer puertas metálicas que le permitan mayor seguridad y durabilidad. Confía que con este crédito logrará pagar la elaboración de dichas puertas y dar a su familia  un mejor respaldo.
texts.en:
Mariana, 38, lives in her own house with her nine-year-old son.  She’s a single mother and thanks to her work and effort has been able to support her home.  She’s a craftswoman.  She makes clay griddles and pots every day that she sells in her community to earn her family’s support.  

She’s owned her house for 30 years and she’s been improving it with much effort over time.  On this occasion she’s decided to replace the wood doors that have been damaged by the sun and rain which is why she’s asking FUSAI for a loan to have metal doors made that will provide increased security and durability.  She trusts that with the loan she’ll be able to pay to have said doors made and to give her family better support.

loans.use: to buy metal doors.

loans.name: Maria Ana De Jesus

texts.es: María es una mujer de 44 años de edad, habita en casa propia desde hace 15 años junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañero de vida, 3 hijas y un hijo.  Ella se dedica  a la elaboración y venta de queso. Su compañero de vida es agricultor y  le colabora con la economía del hogar. María es muy reconocida en su comunidad por ser muy trabajadora, responsable y por el buen producto que ofrece. Su  humilde vivienda es el principal patrimonio con el que cuenta por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera con el fin de cambiar el techo de su casita ya que últimamente el agua se le filtra y no puede proteger a su familia, espera contar con esta ayuda para darle mayor seguridad a su grupo familiar.
texts.en: María is a 44 year old woman. She has lived in her own home for the past 15 years together with her nuclear family, which consists of her life companion, 3 daughters and one son. She makes and sells cheese, Her partner is a farmer who also contributes to the household economy. Maria is well-known in her community for being hard-working, responsible and for the good product she offers. Her modest house is her main asset and she has decided to request a loan from FUSAI so she can buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood. She wants to replace the roof of her house as lately water is filtering through it and she can't protect her family. She hopes to be able to count on this help so she can provide more security for her family.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 37 years old and married. She has four children 17, 15, 13 and 10 years old, whom she supports. 

Janet runs a cereal business which has lasted for two years now.  It is located at Marereni.  She earns a monthly income of KES 4,050.

She was introduced to KADET Ltd by a Kadet officer, and she is taking a third loan from Kadet of KES 20,000, which she intends to use to buy more stock:  maize, beans, cow peas, green grams, and rice. Her previous loan of KES 20,000 she paid back to KADET successfully. 

She will use the anticipated profit to expand her business by making it a wholesale cereal business. Her  hopes and dreams for her future business are  to open a cereal depot and also to make sure her children get a better education and have brighter future

loans.use: To purchase maize, beans, cow peas, green grams, and rice to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jacqueline Areli

texts.es: Jacqueline de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de cinco años de edad. Es una mujer emprendedora pero sobre todo responsable,   todos los días se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a las tareas del hogar y retomar su negocio que consiste en la venta de mariscos como: pescado, camarones, etc. La venta  la realiza de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su comunidad y es así como logra llevar los alimentos a su familia. Su principal patrimonio es su casita que con muchos esfuerzos va mejorando.  Solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para comprar láminas galvanizadas y clavos para cambiar el techo de su hogar ya que el tiempo y las lluvias las han dañado y es necesario hacer el cambio pronto para evitar la filtración del agua y brindar mayor seguridad a su pequeña hija.  Espera poder contar con esta ayuda.
texts.en:
23-year old Jacqueline lives in her own home with her 5-year old daughter. She is an enterprising and above all, responsible, woman. Every day she gets up very early to take care of household chores and then gets back to her business selling seafood: fish, prawns etc. She sells the seafood in the main streets of the town and in this way feeds her family.

Jacqueline’s most important possession is her house which she is making a lot of effort to improve. She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting and nails to renew the roof since age and the rainy season have damaged it. It is necessary to do this work quickly to prevent water leaking into the house. It will also provide greater safety for Jacqueline’s young daughter. 

She hopes that you will help her.

loans.use: buy galvanized sheeting and nails for her roof

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es: El señor Toribio, es una persona de 47  años de edad de estado civil casado, con nivel de instrucción hasta la primaria, cuenta con seis dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico construido con material local, su domicilio se halla ubicado en la comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica principal del señor Toribio  es la producción agrícola en tal sentido anualmente produce los siguientes productos agrícolas; papa 140 cargas, haba (verde) 25 cargas, avena (forraje) 20 calchas  los cuales son cultivados en sus propios terreno agrícolas, con la venta de estos productos agrícolas sustenta a su familia económicamente, por ello el señor Toribio  solicita capital de operación para la compra de insumos agrícola, de tal forma en el futuro podra mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en: Toribio is 47 years old, single, and has an elementary school education.  He has six dependent children and lives in his rustic home built of local materials and located in the Tiraque community.  He is a farmer and every year produces 140 bushels of potatoes, 25 bushels of green beans, 25 beds of oats (fodder) on his own farmland.  The sale of these products supports his family financially.  Toribio is asking for working capital to buy farming supplies so that he will be able to improve his financial situation in the future.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en: Azra is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business.  Currently she requested a loan of Rs.35,000 to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Musrat

texts.en: Musrat, age 27, is a married woman. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 30,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers and buttons. It will allow her to stitch up more dresses on time, which ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca lives in compound #3. She is 40 years old and married with six children between the ages of 15 and 25; only four are attending school. Her husband is a security guide.

For the past three years, she has been running a table in her community where she sells many dried bonnie fish. A challenge she faces is that she doesn't have enough dried bonnie fish on her table.

She learned this way of selling from her mother. She is requesting a loan to buy more dried bonnie fish for her business. She hopes to build a shop and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more dried bonnie fish for her business.

loans.name: Lludy Yamileht

texts.es: Lludy, de 20 años de edad habita en casa muy humilde junto con su madre y su pequeño hijo de 5 años. Lludy  es una joven muy trabajadora y visionaria que con muchos esfuerzos  lleva el sustento a su hogar.  Ella trabaja diariamente en una hacienda que se dedica a la producción de guayabas y es su principal fuente de ingresos.  El  objetivo de Lludy  es brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia,  es por esta razón que se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un préstamo que le permita hacer las instalaciones cables eléctricos necesarios y la conexión de la energía eléctrica en su hogar ya que hasta la fecha no ha podido hacerlo por falta de ingresos y espera poder contar con este crédito para cumplir su objetivo.
texts.en:
Lludy is 20 years old. She lives in a very modest house together with her five year old son and her mother. Lludy is very hard-working and far-seeing young woman who through a lot of effort manages to support her household. She works every day on a farm the grows guavas. This is her principal source of income. 

Lludy's main objective is to provide her family with better living conditions and so she has come to FUSAI to request a loan. She wants to install  the necessary electrical wiring and connect her house to the grid. She has not been able to do this up to now as she doesn't have the financial resources. She hopes to be able to count on this loan to fulfill her objective.

loans.use: to install electric wiring and connect to the electrical grid.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es: Doña Maria, tiene 61 años de edad, esta casada, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en el municipio de Gracias Lempiras junto a su hija menor. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando granos básicos, lleva 10 años que se dedica al cultivo de café. El café lo vende en grano en el mercado local. ha solicitado varios prestamos para mantener su finca en buen estado. El prestamo que solicita es por 10,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes que utilizara para abonar el cultivo de café y  poder seguir dándole mantenimiento a la finca de café. Su meta es mejorar su nivel de vida y la de su familia y poder ayudar a su hija a que termine sus estudios.
texts.en:
María, 61, is married and has four children; she lives in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira with her youngest daughter.  She’s always worked in agriculture growing basic grains and has been growing coffee for the last ten years.  She sells the coffee beans in the local market.  

She’s requested several loans to keep her farm in good condition.  The loan she’s asking for now is for 10,000 Lempiras and she’s going to use it to buy fertilizer to fertilize her coffee plants to continue providing maintenance for her coffee farm.  Her goal is to improve her and her family’s standard of living and to be able to help her daughter complete her schooling.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is 44 years old and married, the mother of eight children. 

She has been running a business of purchases and sales of animals on a seasonal basis for the past six years. She buys animals (baby goats & baby cows) at low prices, brings them up, and then her husband sells them out in the market at higher prices. Currently she has three small cows and two goats and plans to sell them on Eid (religious event of Muslims) or any event which will enhance the profit. 

Shamim has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation.  She has now requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more baby goats and a heifer. 

She is in her fourth loan cycle with a good repayment history.  

She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more baby goats and a heifer.

loans.name: Amiran

texts.en: Amiran is a 53-year-old married man. He lives with his wife, two children, daughter-in-law and granddaughter in the Ozurgeti district. His daughter-in-law works as a salesperson at a local supermarket and earns 200 GEL per month. Amiran works on a minibus line and gets a monthly salary. He decided to start his own business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of $2,100 to purchase a truck to start a trading business. He will trade fruits and vegetables and will have a stable income.

loans.use: to purchase a truck for his trading business

loans.name: Sogharan

texts.en: Sogharan is a 59-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. Sogharan is the mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good-quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, flour and beverages to meet the demands of her customers. She is in her seventh loan cycle with a good credit history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy salt, biscuits, rice, flour and beverages.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo, tiene 55 años de edad, está soltero, tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Hace 6 años que tiene un taller de carpintería donde elabora puerta, mesas, sillas, muebles de cocina de madera etc. El taller lo tiene en su casa y los muebles los hace por pedidos.El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 11,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de madera y materia prima como lijas, pegamento, barniz etc. para la elaboración de puertas, sillas, mesas, muebles de madera. Su meta es desarrollar más el negocio y mejorar el nivel de vida de la familia.
texts.en: Wilfredo, 55, is single and has two children; he lives in the municipality of San Pedro Sula.  He’s had a carpentry shop for six years where he manufactures wooden doors, tables, chairs, kitchen cabinets, etc.  His shop is located at home and he manufactures the furniture to order.  The loan he’s requesting is for 11,000 Lempiras that he’ll use to buy wood and raw materials like sand paper, glue, varnish, etc. to make doors, tables, chairs and wood furniture.  His goal is to develop the business and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies.

loans.name: Lida

texts.es:
Lida, de 41 años es una mujer honesta, responsable y muy trabajadora, está casada con Amador y junto a él tiene 03 hijos de 11, 08 y 02 años de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Lida consiste en brindar servicio de mantenimiento a vehículos. Tiene su taller propio instalado en su casa en donde ofrece diversos servicios como parchado de llantas, reparación vehículos, bajada de motores, tejido de aro, entre otros. Trabaja con ayuda de su cónyuge y de otro ayudante. Su principal labor se centra en la administración del servicio. Lleva en este negocio 02 años atendiendo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Ahora esta viendo la posibilidad de vender bebidas como gaseosas y cervezas debido a la demanda de sus clientes quienes le solicitan estos productos mientras esperan la culminación del servicio en sus vehículos. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el trato directo que tiene con sus clientes, le agrada ver su trabajo final y que ello contribuya a que sus clientes también trabajen mejor. Este es su cuarto crédito con Kiva, está muy emocionada y agradecida por el respaldo económico que le ofrecen para continuar con sus planes, no quiere dejar de pagarlo por falta de dinero y es por eso que se compromete a ser muy puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado de S/. 2000 comprará repuestos de motos y mototaxis y algunas herramientas que usa en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Lida, 41, is an honest, responsible, very hardworking woman married to Amador; they have three children together who are 11, 8 and 2 years old living with them in her own house.  Lida’s work consists in providing vehicle repair services.  She has her own shop located at home where she offers such services as tire repair, vehicle repair, engine block service, rewiring, etc.  She works with help from her spouse and another assistant.  Her main job is scheduling the repairs.  She’s been in business two years and is open from 7 in the morning to 10 at night.

She’s now looking into the possibility of selling beverages like soft-drinks and beer because of the high demand for said products from customers while waiting for their vehicle repairs to be done.  What she likes about her work is the direct interaction with her customers; she enjoys seeing the work done and knowing that she’s contributing to her customers being able to work better.

This is her 4th Kiva loan and she’s very excited and grateful for the economic backup she’s getting to continue towards her plans.  She does not want to fail to repay it for lack of money so she commits to be very punctual with her payments.

She will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy motorcycle and mototaxi spare parts as well as some tools used in her work.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and tools.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es: Saturnina, de 42 años , esta casado y tiene tres hijas de  03, 04, 06 de edad respectivamente . El trabajo al que se dedica Saturnina es la venta de comida rápida y lo complementa con la venta de bebidas heladas. Diariamente se levanta muy temprano y se dirige al mercado de la ciudad en busca de los ingredientes que necesita para preparar sus comidad. Trabaja 06 años en este negocio y lo hace sola. Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que puede hacerlo a lado de sus hijas, siente que su negocio es muy rentable ya que vende un mínimo de 05 pollos al día que le genera una buena ganancia económica, empezó a trabajar con muchas ganas y logró aprender todo lo necesario para que su negocio logre consolidarse, le gustaría mejorar la infraestructura de su establecimiento para atender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3000, por tanto agradece el apoyo que le brindan para continuar tras sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará ingredientes e insumos para poder continuar con su trabajo tales como pollo, papa, aceite, condimentos, verduras, arroz y otros.
texts.en:
42-year old Saturnina is married and has three daughters aged 3, 4, and 6. She earns her living selling fast food as well as cold drinks. She gets up very early every day and sets off for the town market searching for the ingredients she needs for the food. She’s had this business for six years and runs it by herself.

Saturnina really enjoys her work as she can do it while she looks after her children. She feels the business is profitable as she sells at least five chickens a day which brings in a good income. She started this job with great enthusiasm and learned all the was necessary to run a good business. 

Now Saturnina would like to improve the premises so that she can serve her customers in greater comfort. She is seeking a loan of S/. 3000 and wishes to thank donors for the support they bring so that she can complete her objectives. She promises to repay the money punctually. With the money she plans to buy ingredients and supplies so she can continue her work: chicken, potatoes, oil, condiments, vegetables, rice etc.

loans.use: buy ingredients such as chicken, potatoes, oil, condiments, vegetables, rice etc.
